title: FAKE ALERT: Photo of Shahnawaz Hussain and Murli Manohar Joshi circulated with false claims - Times of India
subtitle: News News: Some Twitter users are sharing photos of BJP leaders Syed Shahnawaz Hussain and Murli Manohar Joshi to claim that Joshi’s daughter married Hussain and
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim: Some Twitter users are sharing photos of BJP leaders Syed Shahnawaz Hussain and Murli Manohar Joshi to claim that Joshi’s daughter married Hussain and that he celebrated Eid with them.The picture also has a woman standing between Hussain and Joshi.Another photo of Defence Minister Rajnath Singh sitting with Hussain and the same woman is also being shared to claim that Singh, too, celebrated Eid with them.Taking a dig at BJP’s ideology, one Twitter user wrote, “These guys eat seviyan together and make us fight. You must understand that it is not Hindus who are in danger but their political careers.”Same photos with similar claims are being shared by many on Twitter as well as Facebook.The woman seen in the photos is indeed Hussain’s wife but she is not Joshi’s daughter. Both the pictures being shared are from 2018 when Singh, Joshi, LK Advani and many other BJP leaders visited Hussain to celebrate Eid.Hussain is married to Renu Sharma. She is not related to Joshi.Joshi has two daughters named Priyamvada and Nivedita.Reverse-image searches on the photos led us to a Times of India story from June, 2018 which carried photos of various leaders attending Hussain’s dawat-e-Eid in Delhi. More pictures were found on Hindi news website Jansatta. video from the occasion was shared by news agency ANI.Times Fact Check has found that photos from Shahnawaz Hussain’s Eid celebration in 2018 are being shared with false claims.
